title: Exclusive: Trevor Reed details surviving horrendous conditions in Russian psychiatric treatment facility - CNN
content:
1. Exclusive: Trevor Reed details surviving horrendous conditions in Russian psychiatric treatment facility  CNN
  2. A prison cell, blood and 'zombies': Trevor Reed describes detention in Russia  Reuters.com
  3. Trevor Reed describes conditions in Russian prison and fearing for his life  CNN
  4. Trevor Reed reveals he 'lost hope,' describes squalid cell conditions in Russia in first interview since release  NBC News
  5. Former Marine Trevor Reed on imprisonment: "I wouldn't let myself hope"  Axios
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Trevor Reed, an American citizen and former Marine recently freed after two years in a Russian prison, detailed his harrowing experience surviving a psychiatric treatment facility in the country in an exclusive interview with CNN.
